Html:
Hi all,
I'm trying to add grouping to my datagrid (i'm using the codeplex's DataGrid). Is there any convenient way to do it? In ListView for example I usually use the GroupDescriptions and GroupStyle properties.Is there any corresponding properties in the DataGrid (especially for GroupDescriptions )? Does the GroupStyleSelector & GroupStyle properties has any relevance for that purpose?

Thanks in advance

Adding a GroupStyle to a DataGrid is similar to a ListView.  The sample on this post, http://blogs.msdn.com/vinsibal/archive/2008/08/11/net-3-5-sp1-and-wpf-datagrid-ctp-is-out-now.aspx, shows how to create a GroupStyle dynamically on the DataGrid.
Thanks for your reply and for the sample. It's really simple to use it
